ygData.subject: Re: Amulet of Order
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I m a Human Bard, follower of Bristlebane. I m pretty sure the gypsies are indifferent to me. (Could be wrong because I stay invis when buying from them.
ygData.messageBody:
Well I'm a Human Bard, follower of Bristlebane.
I'm pretty sure the gypsies are indifferent to me. (Could be wrong
because I stay invis when buying from them. Dumb SGs.)
I'm not sure how much they offer for the combine. I sold mine (when I
got a barbed whip) to the bard's guild shop in freeport. And they're
amiable, and I did get 47.5pp for it.
The shady swashbuckler is indifferent to me, but I don't remember how
much the WB longsword costs. I'm in Qeynos area now so it might be a
while til I can get back on this. Maybe if another Human bard out there
with 90+ charisma knows the price on the well balanced longsword?
